strapiPost.title: Razorbacks To Play In 2022 Maui Invitational
strapiPost.content:
The Razorbacks' Menâ€™s Basketball team will head to Hawaii this November for the 2022 Maui Jim Maui Invitational. 

  • Alohogs: The first round of the eight-team tournament will pit the Hogs against the Louisville Cardinals on Nov. 21st at 4 pm central time. 
  • Homecoming: The Jim Maui Invitational will make an exciting return to Hawaii after being hosted on the mainland for the past two years due to COVID.

Check out the full list of participating teams HERE.
